channel.title: Heroicscape V5! Torva,Virtus,Pernix,Chaotics,Divine[Summoning] [SlayerSystem]
channel.description:
I've never released anything before here, so bear with me there. Hope you enjoy Its good for a person who wants a PvP Server Thanks, any feedback would be great, I know the PvP DROPS code is SLOPPY :S Sorry for no chatheads, I'm not too great with client sided stuff :S Heres a bit of media ] [size=large]Home![/size] [img]http://puu.sh/2b4Nn[/img] [size=large]Safe PvP Zones With Drops[/size] [img]http://puu.sh/2b4PM[/img] [size=large]TeamPk[Safe][/size] [img]http://puu.sh/2b4SI[/img] [size=large]JunglePk [Dangerous][Safe][/size] [img]http://puu.sh/2b4VC[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2b4Hp[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1X4sG[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1X4y1[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1X45O[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1X46S[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1X4ch[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1X4HA[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1X4Ia[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1X4Ia[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1X4Jg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1X4JQ[/img] Super Donator + Normal Donator, Both have benefits, CBA to show em [img]http://puu.sh/1X4Lj[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2gd6f[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/FLBJno5.png[/img]
Memleaks fixed Made it a bit more stable Yell timers Varrock Bank PvP Clean ::item code [Not a huge fking mess] Good restricted Spawn Great for large playerbases Great Donator Benefits Great instant Pking Commands with restrictions New money system to prevent dupes and such Amazing Killstreak System Great new gambling system Fixed PJ Timer Redid applydead Fixed Admin/Owner Deaths, e.g. if you kill an owner/admin or die to one, neither looses items Redid Magic Redid Melee Maxhit Calculations Fixed combat levels New shopassistant class PvP Task System Redid Skills Fixed Bosses Made it So you get PkP While PvMing [Killing Corp gets you PkP] Safe Home with Perfect PvP Drops And some more stuff I forgot :P
Credits Tuts/Snips - ~1% Me - 3% HyBriDPvP - 5% PI - 8% Jagex - Rest (though they'd have more, cba with decimals) Downloads: Source: http://uppit.com/m31pu2ci60de/Source.7z Client: http://uppit.com/zrcdtgh5psva/HClient.7z Cache: http://uppit.com/33f3gm2q97q7/heroicscape.7z If the Download links gets removed post in comments!

I’ve never released anything before here, so bear with me there. Hope you enjoy

Its good for a person who wants a PvP Server

Thanks, any feedback would be great, I know the PvP DROPS code is SLOPPY :S

Sorry for no chatheads, I’m not too great with client sided stuff :S

Heres a bit of media

Super Donator + Normal Donator, Both have benefits, CBA to show em



Memleaks fixed Made it a bit more stable Yell timers Varrock Bank PvP Clean ::item code [Not a huge fking mess] Good restricted Spawn Great for large playerbases Great Donator Benefits Great instant Pking Commands with restrictions New money system to prevent dupes and such Amazing Killstreak System Great new gambling system Fixed PJ Timer Redid applydead Fixed Admin/Owner Deaths, e.g. if you kill an owner/admin or die to one, neither looses items Redid Magic Redid Melee Maxhit Calculations Fixed combat levels New shopassistant class PvP Task System Redid Skills Fixed Bosses Made it So you get PkP While PvMing [Killing Corp gets you PkP] Safe Home with Perfect PvP Drops And some more stuff I forgot :P
